fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.info: Provide a title for your annotation - this will show up prominently, for example, in search results in the catalogue.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.info: Provide a description for your annotation. This will be seen by all users.

fields.label: Notes
fields.name: notes
fields.info: Add notes for your own use.

fields.label: Language
fields.name: language
fields.info: The default language is English, only change of this is not the case.

fields.label: Resource
fields.name: resource
fields.info: The URL to the resource you are annotation - automatically filled, and normally, no need to change.

fields.label: Resource Type
fields.name: resource_type
fields.info: The type of resource you are annotating. If you are unsure, use 'Other'. The tag is used to filter annotations by resource group.

fields.label: Keywords/Tags
fields.name: keywords
fields.info: Add keywords and tags to characterise or classify the annotation. The type-ahead list is filtered by the current group selections, but this can be turned off.

fields.label: RDA Pathways
fields.name: pathways
fields.info: Select an RDA Pathway from the list. You can start typing to filter the list.

fields.label: GORC Elements
fields.name: gorc_elements
fields.info: Select a GORC Element from the list. You can start typing to filter the list. Read more about GORC.

fields.label: GORC Attributes
fields.name: gorc_attributes
fields.info: Select a GORC Attribute from the list. You can start typing to filter the list. Read more about GORC.

fields.label: Interest Groups
fields.name: interest_groups
fields.info: Select an RDA Interest Group from the list. You can start typing to filter the list.

fields.label: Working Groups
fields.name: working_groups
fields.info: Select an RDA Working Group from the list. You can start typing to filter the list.

fields.label: Disciplines (Domains)
fields.name: disciplines
fields.info: Select an RDA Scientific Discipline (Domain) from the list. You can start typing to filter the list.

fields.label: MOMSI
fields.name: momsi
fields.info: Select a MOMSI category from the list. You can start typing to filter the list.
